channel.title: spotify on Notes
channel.description: Read the latest spotify on Notes

item.title: Duplicate Spotify playlist
item.description: To duplicate a Spotify playlist: Open that playlist Hit CTRL+A Right click -> copy Create new playlist Hit CTRL+V
item.content:encoded:
To duplicate a Spotify playlist:

  • Open that playlist
  • Hit CTRL+A
  • Right click -> copy
  • Create new playlist
  • Hit CTRL+V
